segments.text: Hi , Mary , I didn't see you at work this morning . Are you all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I feel miserable . I've got a bad cold , My head is dizzy and my nose is running .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm so sorry to hear that . Have you seen a doctor or taken any medicines ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a matter of fact I have , The doctor said it'll go away after a day or two.He ' s prescribed me some tablets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it helps me but I just have to wait and let my system do the work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no , I'm fine.My refrigerator is piled up with food.But if it's not too much trouble for you . I'd like something to read .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , I'll get it for you.Books or magazines ?
segments.speaker: S1
